title: Create Localized Product Card
description: Build a product card that displays localized prices, dates, and pluralized review counts.
instructions: Create a ProductCard widget that shows: (1) Product name (localized), (2) Price formatted for current locale, (3) 'X reviews' with proper pluralization, (4) 'Last updated: [date]' with locale-aware date formatting. The card should work correctly in both LTR and RTL layouts.

hints.text: Use NumberFormat.currency(locale: locale, name: currencyCode).format(price) for locale-aware currency formatting
Use DateFormat.yMMMd(locale).format(date) for medium-length date formatting
Use EdgeInsetsDirectional instead of EdgeInsets to support RTL layouts correctly

commonMistakes.consequence: Currency displays incorrectly in different locales
commonMistakes.correction: Use NumberFormat.currency with locale parameter to get proper currency formatting

commonMistakes.mistake: Using simple string interpolation for pluralization
commonMistakes.consequence: Incorrect grammar in different languages (e.g., '1 reviews')
commonMistakes.correction: Use ICU plural syntax in ARB files: {count, plural, =1{1 review} other{{count} reviews}}
